scenes.description: All participating hololive members perform the grand finale song 'Our Bright Parade' to conclude the countdown live.
Ending credits roll, listing the cast and setlist of the event.

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 探しに行く
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade! Let's go find it

subtitles.original: スカートは何回だって
subtitles.english: No matter how many times my skirt...

subtitles.original: ただ 独り言 続いた
subtitles.english: I just kept talking to myself

subtitles.original: ただ 始まりたくて走った
subtitles.english: I just ran because I wanted to start

subtitles.original: 遠く 暗がりに灯った
subtitles.english: A light flickered far away in the dark

subtitles.original: それは 眩しすぎた名前
subtitles.english: That was a name that shone too brightly

subtitles.original: それは 優しすぎる思い出
subtitles.english: Those are memories that are far too kind

subtitles.original: もっと 近づけと手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: I reached out to get closer

subtitles.original: 思いがけず 結び合った
subtitles.english: Unexpectedly, we were joined together

subtitles.original: ほら 今 迷子はいなくなった
subtitles.english: Look, now no one is lost anymore

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade! We're gonna shine!

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛おしさも 全部おいで
subtitles.english: Frustration and endearment—bring it all along

subtitles.original: 風 夢 跳ね 飛び立てるさ
subtitles.english: The wind, our dreams, and wings—we can fly

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈りは光
subtitles.english: A modest prayer becomes a light

subtitles.original: 終わりなき陽射し
subtitles.english: An endless sunlight

subtitles.original: 君を見つけたこと 胸を張れるよ
subtitles.english: Finding you is something I can be proud of

subtitles.original: ここから これから
subtitles.english: From here on out, from this moment on

subtitles.original: アワー ブライト パレパレパレ
subtitles.english: Our Bright Parade, parade, parade!

subtitles.original: まだ 頼りない予感を
subtitles.english: With this still-uncertain premonition

subtitles.original: 歌う 恥ずかしくって泣いた
subtitles.english: I sing; I cried out of embarrassment

subtitles.original: 誰も 溶けぬ日 まさに
subtitles.english: On a day where no one dissolves, indeed

subtitles.original: いつか また会える おまじない
subtitles.english: Is a charm to ensure we'll meet again

subtitles.original: あの日 手の中に始まった
subtitles.english: On that day, it began in our hands

subtitles.original: ストーリー 数え切れない言葉
subtitles.english: A story, with words beyond counting

subtitles.original: 震えるような思いじゃないさ
subtitles.english: It's not just a feeling that makes me tremble

subtitles.original: ほら 今 僕らを一つと呼ぼう
subtitles.english: Look, now let's call us 'one'

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 美しいんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade! It's beautiful!

subtitles.original: 許し合える切なさ 夜はきらめく
subtitles.english: The sadness of mutual forgiveness makes the night sparkle

subtitles.original: 雨 晴れ パレ 混ざり合う空
subtitles.english: Rain, sunshine, parade—all mixing in the sky

subtitles.original: ふさわしい旅路は 君と歩くのさ
subtitles.english: The journey that suits me best is the one I walk with you

subtitles.original: 君と歩くのだ
subtitles.english: I'm walking with you

subtitles.original: 「ただいま」を聞けば 「おかえり」って叫ぶよ
subtitles.english: If I hear 'I'm home,' I'll shout back 'Welcome back!'

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃないか
subtitles.english: Isn't that obvious?

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade! We're gonna shine!

subtitles.original: 暗がりを満たすのは 君だ 僕だ
subtitles.english: What fills the darkness is you and me

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade! We're gonna shine!

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛おしさも 全部おいで
subtitles.english: Frustration and endearment—bring it all along

subtitles.original: 風 夢 跳ね 飛び立てるさ
subtitles.english: The wind, our dreams, and wings—we can fly

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈りは光
subtitles.english: A modest prayer becomes a light

subtitles.original: 終わりなき陽射し
subtitles.english: An endless sunlight

subtitles.original: 君と飛び込んでいく 素敵なステージさ
subtitles.english: Diving in with you—it's a wonderful stage

subtitles.original: ここから これから
subtitles.english: From here on out, from this moment on

subtitles.original: アワー ブライト パレパレパレ
subtitles.english: Our Bright Parade, parade, parade!

subtitles.original: アワー ブライト パレパレパレ
subtitles.english: Our Bright Parade, parade, parade!

subtitles.original: キャスト
subtitles.english: Cast

subtitles.original: セットリスト
subtitles.english: Setlist
